doc:
Pat Buttram https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pat_Buttram 0 Maxwell Emmett "Pat" Buttram (June 19, 1915 – January 8, 1994) was an American character actor, known for playing the sidekick of Gene Autry and for playing the character of Mr. Haney in the television series Green Acres. He had a distinctive voice that, in his own words, "never quite made it through puberty". Maxwell_Emmett_"_Pat_"_Buttram ( June_19_,_1915 – January_8_,_1994 ) was an_American_character_actor , known for playing the_sidekick of Gene_Autry and for playing the_character of Mr._Haney in the_television_series_Green_Acres . He had a_distinctive_voice that , in his_own_words , " never_quite made it through puberty_" .
